name: Applimoé: Appliance Moe!!
description:
Applimoé: Appliance Moe!! is a visual novel style dating sim in which you, the player, find yourself taking care of a house full of Applimoé, the literal embodyment of everyday household appliances and gadgets. However, just because they're electronics and the like, doesn't mean they don't have feelings! It's up to you to build a rapport so they can each continue to work properly, and who knows, maybe that bond can become a relationship.. With a cast ensemble including a Toaster, a TV a Radio, and more, you'll be asking "Why is my air conditioning etc the best girl?!"

⦁    More than 10 characters! Discover each Applimoé's unique personality and quirks through the game's dialog!

⦁    Make your choices wisely! Build up character relationships through many choices, spending time with the Applimoé and even a minigame or two! However, your decisions may either help or hinder your progress.

⦁    Time is of the essence! Try to uncover the story's mysteries and characters past before your time with them comes to an end. Multiple endings planned!

⦁    Need a hint? If your ever would like to know what they think of you, there's an enigmatic Applimoé full of secrets to share with you, but at what cost?

⦁    More coming soon! A demo version giving a taste of the cast and story is available now, with a full version of the game in development!
